org.zoolu.net

Class UdpPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zoolu.net.UdpPacket

  • public class UdpPacket
extends java.lang.Object
    UdpPacket provides a uniform interface to UDP packets, regardless J2SE or J2ME is used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UdpPacket(byte[] buf, int length)
      Creates a new UdpPacket
      UdpPacket(byte[] buf, int offset, int length)
      Creates a new UdpPacket
      UdpPacket(byte[] buf, int offset, int length, IpAddress ipaddr, int port)
      Creates a new UdpPacket
      UdpPacket(byte[] buf, int length, IpAddress ipaddr, int port)
      Creates a new UdpPacket

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getData()
      Gets the data received or the data to be sent.
      IpAddress getIpAddress()
      Gets the IP address of the machine to which this datagram is being sent or from which the datagram was received.
      int getLength()
      Gets the length of the data to be sent or the length of the data received.
      int getOffset()
      Gets the offset of the data to be sent or the offset of the data received.
      int getPort()
      Gets the port number on the remote host to which this datagram is being sent or from which the datagram was received.
      void setData(byte[] buf)
      Sets the data buffer for this packet.
      void setData(byte[] buf, int offset, int length)
      Sets the data buffer for this packet.
      void setIpAddress(IpAddress ipaddr)
      Sets the IP address of the machine to which this datagram is being sent.
      void setLength(int length)
      Sets the length for this packet.
      void setPort(int iport)
      Sets the port number on the remote host to which this datagram is being sent.
